data.content:
**Sorry – I wasn’t able to pull the weather information for you.** The automated task that was supposed to retrieve the current weather for Chennai and Bengaluru ran into an error (“No JSON found in LLM response”), so no temperature, humidity, or forecast data could be returned. --- ### What you can do next | City | Quick way to get the current weather | |-----------|--------------------------------------| | **Chennai** | • Visit a weather site (e.g., [weather.com](https://weather.com), [AccuWeather](https://www.accuweather.com)) and search “Chennai”.
• Or type **“Chennai weather”** directly into Google – the top result shows temperature, humidity, precipitation chance, wind, etc. | | **Bengaluru** | • Same as above – search “Bengaluru weather” on any major weather portal or Google.
• You can also use a mobile weather app (e.g., WeatherBug, The Weather Channel) and add both cities to your favorites for instant updates. | If you need a more detailed report (hour‑by‑hour forecast, 7‑day outlook, or historical data), just let me know and I can fetch it from a specific weather API or provide step‑by‑step instructions to do so.

final_response:
**Sorry – I wasn’t able to pull the weather information for you.** The automated task that was supposed to retrieve the current weather for Chennai and Bengaluru ran into an error (“No JSON found in LLM response”), so no temperature, humidity, or forecast data could be returned. --- ### What you can do next | City | Quick way to get the current weather | |-----------|--------------------------------------| | **Chennai** | • Visit a weather site (e.g., [weather.com](https://weather.com), [AccuWeather](https://www.accuweather.com)) and search “Chennai”.
• Or type **“Chennai weather”** directly into Google – the top result shows temperature, humidity, precipitation chance, wind, etc. | | **Bengaluru** | • Same as above – search “Bengaluru weather” on any major weather portal or Google.
• You can also use a mobile weather app (e.g., WeatherBug, The Weather Channel) and add both cities to your favorites for instant updates. | If you need a more detailed report (hour‑by‑hour forecast, 7‑day outlook, or historical data), just let me know and I can fetch it from a specific weather API or provide step‑by‑step instructions to do so.
